title: Entry Form, "Ten Year Anniversary Exhibition Entry", 1988
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center, right: Design: Edward Fella
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper left quadrant: Detroit Focus was originated by artist to assure a prmary role in/ policy development and programming of creative art work...[gallery's mission statement]... milestone in our history.  Across upper third of sheet: TENYEAR ANNIVERSARY EXHIBITIONS ENTRY/ CURATORS Part I - Curated by Mary Jane Jacob, Chief Curator, Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, California/ Part II Curated by Detroit Focus Exhibition Committee:/ Richard Axsom/...[lists members of committee]... Joe Zajac; across left edge: OPEN EXHIBITION WORK IN ALL MEDIA/ Artists are eligible to/ participate, if they/ exhibited at Detroit Focus/ between July 1978--/ July 1988/ Preliminary judging by/ slides only Submit/...[gives slide labeling instructions, entry rules]... required to staff the/ gallery for one day/ during an exhibition; across upper right edge: TEN YEAR ANNIVERSARY EXHIBITION PART i February 10- March 11/ TN YEAR ANNIVERSARY EXHIBITION PART II March 17 - April 14, 1989; across center: 1978 1979... [lists years]... 1988; across lower right quadrant: PROCESS/ You must be a previous Detroit Focus exhibitor/ (The gallery has a list of over 500 Artists participants in the past ten years.)/ There will be no Entry Fees... [lists rules, deadlines, application with space to fill name, address, etc.]... Signed_________________
Verso: Across lower left edge: DETROIT/ FOCUS/ GALLERY/ TEN YEAR; across lower edge: ANNIVERSARYEXHIBITIONS; running upward, sideways: ENTRY DEADLINE: JUNE 25 1988; across lower third of sheet: PART ONE FEBRUARY 10 - MARCH 11 1989/ PART TWO MARCH 17 - APRIL 141989; across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan/ 48226/ Gallery Hours: Wednesday- Saturday 12 noon to 6 p. m. Phone: 313-962-9025; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Mich./ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ entry form printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles thoughout. 
Recto: Across upper left quadrant, text giving statement of gallery.  Center, right, abstract line design, logo.  Across lower two thirds of sheet, text giving entry form and information. 
Verso: Across upper two thirds of sheet, street map of Detroit with written notes for location of gallery.  Across lower third of sheet mailing and additional information.

tombstone.epitaph: Entry Form, "Ten Year Anniversary Exhibition Entry", 1988. Offset lithograph on orange-yellow paper. Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-15.
